name: HKStatistics
desc: An object that represents the result of calculating the minimum, maximum, average, or sum over a set of samples from the HealthKit store.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The start of the time period included in these statistics.

items.name: var endDate: Date
items.desc: The end of the time period included in these statistics.

items.name: var quantityType: HKQuantityType
items.desc: The quantity type of the samples used to calculate these statistics.

items.name: var sources: [HKSource]?
items.desc: An array containing all the sources contributing to these statistics.

items.name: func averageQuantity() -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the average value from all the samples that match the query.

items.name: func averageQuantity(for: HKSource) -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the average value from all the samples that match the query and that were created by the specified source.

items.name: func maximumQuantity() -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the maximum value from all the samples that match the query.

items.name: func maximumQuantity(for: HKSource) -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the maximum value from all the samples that match the query and that were created by the specified source.

items.name: func minimumQuantity() -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the minimum value from all the samples that match the query.

items.name: func minimumQuantity(for: HKSource) -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the minimum value from all the samples that match the query and that were created by the specified source.

items.name: func sumQuantity() -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the sum of all the samples that match the query.

items.name: func sumQuantity(for: HKSource) -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the sum of all the samples that match the query and that were created by the specified source.

items.name: func duration() -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the total duration covering all the samples that match the query.

items.name: func duration(for: HKSource) -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the total duration covering all the samples created by the specified source that also match the query.

items.name: func mostRecentQuantity() -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the most recent value from all the samples that match the query.

items.name: func mostRecentQuantity(for: HKSource) -> HKQuantity?
items.desc: Returns the most recent value from all the samples that match the query and were created by the specified source.

items.name: func mostRecentQuantityDateInterval() -> DateInterval?
items.desc: Returns the date interval of the most recent sample that matches the query.

items.name: func mostRecentQuantityDateInterval(for: HKSource) -> DateInterval?
items.desc: Returns the date interval of the most recent sample that matches the query and was created by the specified source.
